title: Urbanization at Its Peak
description: In 2024, Singapore's entire urban population resides in its largest city, marking a 100% urbanization rate, the highest globally.

title: Financial Accessibility for All
description: As of 2023, Singapore boasts 2,902 depositors per 1,000 adults in commercial banks, indicating widespread financial inclusion.

title: Exemplary Government Effectiveness
description: In 2023, Singapore achieved a perfect 100 percentile rank in government effectiveness, showcasing its superior governance.

title: High Human Capital Index
description: With a Human Capital Index of 0.88 in 2020, Singapore ranks among the top globally, reflecting its strong investment in education and health.

title: Robust Business Insolvency Framework
description: In 2024, Singapore scored 89.7 in business insolvency, highlighting its efficient regulatory environment for businesses.

title: Top-Tier Statistical Performance
description: Singapore achieved a perfect score of 100 in Pillar 2 data services in 2023, indicating world-class statistical capabilities.

title: Efficient Logistics Infrastructure
description: In 2022, Singapore scored 4.6 in the quality of trade and transport-related infrastructure, ranking among the best globally.

title: High GDP Per Capita
description: In 2023, Singapore's GDP per capita reached $141,553, reflecting its strong economic performance and high living standards.

title: Comprehensive Sanitation Services
description: By 2022, 100% of Singapore's urban population had access to safely managed sanitation services, setting a global benchmark.

title: Minimal Arable Land Per Person
description: In 2021, Singapore had one of the lowest arable land per person ratios globally, with only 0.0001 hectares available per person.

title: Significant Foreign Direct Investment Outflow
description: In 2024, Singapore experienced a net foreign direct investment outflow of approximately $96.68 billion, indicating a substantial capital movement out of the country.

title: Efficient Power Transmission
description: Singapore's electric power transmission and distribution losses were remarkably low at 0.3% of output in 2022, showcasing efficient energy management.

title: Minimal Rural Population in Low Elevation Areas
description: As of 2015, only 0.007% of Singapore's rural population lived in areas below 5 meters elevation, reducing vulnerability to sea-level rise.

title: Negative Net Investment in Nonfinancial Assets
description: In 2016, Singapore's net investment in nonfinancial assets was negative at -1.02% of GDP, indicating a reduction in asset accumulation.

title: Stable Political Environment
description: In 2023, Singapore maintained a low standard error of 0.21 in political stability and absence of violence, reflecting a stable political climate.

title: Low Learning Poverty Among Female Children
description: In 2021, only 2.1% of female children at the end of primary age in Singapore were below minimum reading proficiency, indicating strong educational outcomes.

title: Near Universal Primary School Enrollment
description: In 2021, only 0.03% of primary school-age children were out of school, demonstrating near-universal enrollment in Singapore.

title: Short Secondary Education Duration
description: As of 2023, the duration of secondary education in Singapore was 4 years, which is shorter compared to many other countries.

title: Negligible Mortality from Unintentional Poisoning
description: In 2021, the mortality rate from unintentional poisoning in Singapore was extremely low at 0.0001 per 100,000 population.

title: Minimal Employment in Agriculture
description: In 2023, only 0.1% of male employment and 0.09% of total employment in Singapore was in agriculture, reflecting a highly urbanized economy.

title: Low Early Marriage Rate Among Women
description: In 2023, only 0.1% of women aged 20-24 in Singapore were married by age 18, indicating progressive social norms.

title: Low Tariff Rates on Imports
description: In 2022, Singapore maintained low tariff rates with a simple mean of 0.05% for all products and 0.07% for most favored nations.

title: Low Intentional Homicide Rates
description: In 2021, Singapore recorded low intentional homicide rates with 0.07 per 100,000 females and 0.13 per 100,000 males, reflecting a safe society.
